00035 typedef struct l4re_env_cap_entry_t
00036 {
00040   l4_cap_idx_t cap;
00041 
00046   l4_umword_t flags;
00047 
00051   char name[16];
00052 #ifdef __cplusplus
00053 
00057   l4re_env_cap_entry_t() : cap(L4_INVALID_CAP), flags(~0) {}
00058 
00067   l4re_env_cap_entry_t(char const *n, l4_cap_idx_t c, l4_umword_t f = 0)
00068   : cap(c), flags(f)
00069   {
00070     for (unsigned i = 0; n && i < sizeof(name); ++i, ++n)
00071       {
00072         name[i] = *n;
00073   if (!*n)
00074     break;
00075       }
00076   }
00077 #endif
00078 } l4re_env_cap_entry_t;
00079 
00080 
00087 typedef struct l4re_env_t
00088 {
00089   l4_cap_idx_t parent;         
00090   l4_cap_idx_t rm;             
00091   l4_cap_idx_t mem_alloc;      
00092   l4_cap_idx_t log;            
00093   l4_cap_idx_t main_thread;    
00094   l4_cap_idx_t factory;        
00095   l4_cap_idx_t scheduler;      
00096   l4_cap_idx_t first_free_cap; 
00097   l4_fpage_t utcb_area;        
00098   l4_addr_t first_free_utcb;   
00099   l4re_env_cap_entry_t *caps;
00100 } l4re_env_t;
00101

00136 l4re_get_env_cap(char const *name) L4_NOTHROW;

00147 l4re_get_env_cap_e(char const *name, l4re_env_t const *e) L4_NOTHROW;
00148 
00159 L4_INLINE l4re_env_cap_entry_t const *
00160 l4re_get_env_cap_l(char const *name, unsigned l, l4re_env_t const *e) L4_NOTHROW;

00163 L4_INLINE
00164 l4re_env_t *l4re_env() L4_NOTHROW
00165 { return l4re_global_env; }
00166 
00167 L4_INLINE
00168 l4_kernel_info_t *l4re_kip() L4_NOTHROW
00169 {
00170   extern char __L4_KIP_ADDR__[1];
00171   return (l4_kernel_info_t *)__L4_KIP_ADDR__;
00172 }
00173 
00174 L4_INLINE l4re_env_cap_entry_t const *
00175 l4re_get_env_cap_l(char const *name, unsigned l, l4re_env_t const *e) L4_NOTHROW
00176 {
00177   l4re_env_cap_entry_t const *c = e->caps;
00178   for (; c && c->flags != ~0UL; ++c)
00179     {
00180       unsigned i;
00181       char const *n = name;
00182       for (i = 0; i < sizeof(c->name) && i < l && c->name[i] && *n && *n == c->name[i]; ++i, ++n)
00183   ;
00184 
00185       if (i == l && (i == sizeof(c->name) || !c->name[i]))
00186   return c;
00187     }
00188   return NULL;
00189 }
00190 
00191 L4_INLINE l4_cap_idx_t
00192 l4re_get_env_cap_e(char const *name, l4re_env_t const *e) L4_NOTHROW
00193 {
00194   unsigned l;
00195   l4re_env_cap_entry_t const *r;
00196   for (l = 0; name[l]; ++l) ;
00197   r = l4re_get_env_cap_l(name, l, e);
00198   if (r)
00199     return r->cap;
00200 
00201   return L4_INVALID_CAP;
00202 }
00203 
00204 L4_INLINE l4_cap_idx_t
00205 l4re_get_env_cap(char const *name) L4_NOTHROW
00206 { return l4re_get_env_cap_e(name, l4re_env()); }
